CustomField.description: AE1 ONLY: Score Indicating Increased Likelihood of Converting to an Opportunity - <Deprecated as part of GTMS-1805 and will be deleted by Nov 16th>
CustomField.formula:
CASE(
Account_Size_Segment__c,'AE1',
IF(AND(Number_of_Vehicles__c > 20, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 30), 5, IF(AND(Number_of_Vehicles__c > 10, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 20), 3, IF(Number_of_Vehicles__c < 10, 0,0))), 0)
+IF(CONTAINS('Waste Management, Electrical, Healthcare, Other, Transportation & Warehousing', TEXT(Industry)), 5, IF(CONTAINS('Oil & Gas, Landscaping, Professional Services, Transportation - Passenger Transit', TEXT(Industry)), 3,0))
+IF(Closed_Lost_Opportunities__c > 0, 5, 0)
+IF(CONTAINS('(Parent) Adwords, (Parent) Website Visitor, (Parent) Bing, (Parent) Free Trial Form, (Parent) Software Advice, (Parent) Referrals, (Parent) External Lead Gen, (Parent) Capterra, (Parent) Inbound call/email', Parent_Campaign_FT__c),5, IF(CONTAINS('(Parent) Facebook, (Parent) Adwords Non Branded, (Parent) Facebook Non Branded', Parent_Campaign_FT__c),3,0))
+IF(CONTAINS('Texas, Georgia, Louisiana, Florida, Nevada, New Jersey, California', BillingState ),5,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: AE1 ONLY: Score Indicating Increased Likelihood of Converting to an Opportunity
CustomField.label: Account Prioritization Score[Don't Use]
